Reach the right
decision makers

Sell more and close more with the most accurate B2B
company and contact data.

Reach your ideal customers when
they are most likely to buy with:

Intent

Indicates a company's "likelihood to buy" based on their
behavioral signals so you can offer them exactly what
they're looking for.

Job Change Filter and Alerts

Stay up to date on your prospects' job changes so you can
explore new business opportunities.

Technology Filter

Gives you the ability to target companies based on their
tech stacks.

Spend more time selling

Unrivaled data quality

Enhance your sales game with
globally compliant and accurate
data. Trusted by 1M users.

Prospect stronger

Fill your pipeline with qualified
leads based on buyer intent data.

Ramp reps faster

Onboard your entire team in 10
minutes. Prospect at scale right
away.

Top revenue teams rely on Lusha to smash their goals

Increase in demos

Reach all your ideal customers from one place

Platform

Extension

Enrich

Get laser-focused
lists

Use our razor-sharp filters to get your list of 1,000
prospects in one go. Easily build your lists with
accurate and actionable data on each single prospect.
In one click, export lists to your CRM and put your
workflows on autopilot.

Run your sales cycles like a sprint

Pinpoint your ideal customer

Easily build precise contact lists using our advanced search filters. Pull up accurate emails, work numbers, and direct dials on the right prospects in seconds.

Enrich your entire CRM

Push contact lists to your favorite tools and enrich them with actionable data in one click. Easily score, route, and update your pipeline with accurate information.

Search smarter every time

Get instant ideal customer profile insights based on past searches. Identify which source brings in the most leads and reach your KPIs even faster.

Data privacy you can’t get
elsewhere

Lusha is the first ISO 27701 certified sales intelligence solution in the
market. Work with the highest standards of privacy and security in
the world.

The freshest data you can find

Join the largest community and work with the cleanest data day in,
day out. Share your network’s contact info, get accurate data, free
credits, and access to early features.

Laser target your next best customer with all the right data attributes
